channel.title: [PI] Creating new fishing spots [PI]
channel.description:
Right first of all, I've started with a PI base. The current fishing spots are located in Catherby and I'd like to change them to the water in tutorial island. I have the coordinates if that's what I need but I don't seem to be finding any way of changing them. Someone offer any help?
[i]Also[/i] I am having trouble relocating the teleport and i can't see what I am doing wrong. The original coords are at 2813, 3436 so i gave them a search and changed them to what I wanted them to be (3103, 3096). But when I compile and open the server it doesn't change, and when i click the teleport it goes to the original location. Something im missing out? help!

item.dc:creator: @ProximityPlus ProximityPlus
item.description:
@ProximityPlus wrote:

RsInFecTion:

You probably changed the wrong coords, keep searching trough files.

The coords i changed were definately for the teleport, it comes up with no more results! Is there no where else i can change where teleports go to?

Read full topic
